64829.text: Fixes a bug that non directory hostpath type can be recognized as HostPathFile and adds e2e tests for HostPathType
64829.markdown: Fixes a bug that non directory hostpath type can be recognized as HostPathFile and adds e2e tests for HostPathType ([#64829](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/64829), [@dixudx](https://github.com/dixudx)) [SIG Apps, Storage and Testing]
64829.author: dixudx

88723.text: kubectl supports taint no without specifying(without having to type the full resource name)
88723.markdown: Kubectl supports taint no without specifying(without having to type the full resource name) ([#88723](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88723), [@wawa0210](https://github.com/wawa0210)) [SIG CLI]
88723.author: wawa0210

89128.text: Kubelet's --runonce option is now also available in Kubelet's config file as `runOnce`.
89128.markdown: Kubelet's --runonce option is now also available in Kubelet's config file as `runOnce`. ([#89128](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89128), [@vincent178](https://github.com/vincent178)) [SIG Node]
89128.author: vincent178

89594.text:
Promote Immutable Secrets/ConfigMaps feature to Beta and enable the feature by default.
This allows to set `Immutable` field in Secrets or ConfigMap object to mark their contents as immutable.
89594.markdown:
Promote Immutable Secrets/ConfigMaps feature to Beta and enable the feature by default.
  This allows to set `Immutable` field in Secrets or ConfigMap object to mark their contents as immutable. ([#89594](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89594), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG Apps and Testing]
89594.author: wojtek-t

89644.markdown: - Update opencontainers/runtime-spec dependency to v1.0.2 ([#89644](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89644), [@saschagrunert](https://github.com/saschagrunert)) [SIG Node]
89644.author: saschagrunert

89660.text: jsonpath support in kubectl / client-go serializes complex types (maps / slices / structs) as json instead of Go-syntax.
89660.markdown: Jsonpath support in kubectl / client-go serializes complex types (maps / slices / structs) as json instead of Go-syntax. ([#89660](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89660), [@pjferrell](https://github.com/pjferrell)) [SIG API Machinery, CLI and Cluster Lifecycle]
89660.author: pjferrell

90018.text: k8s.io/apimachinery - scheme.Convert() now uses only explicitly registered conversions - default reflection based conversion is no longer available. `+k8s:conversion-gen` tags can be used with the `k8s.io/code-generator` component to generate conversions.
90018.markdown: K8s.io/apimachinery - scheme.Convert() now uses only explicitly registered conversions - default reflection based conversion is no longer available. `+k8s:conversion-gen` tags can be used with the `k8s.io/code-generator` component to generate conversions. ([#90018](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90018), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG API Machinery, Apps and Testing]
90018.author: wojtek-t

90175.text: kube-proxy exposes a new metric, `kubeproxy_sync_proxy_rules_last_queued_timestamp_seconds`, that indicates the last time a change for kube-proxy was queued to be applied.
90175.markdown: Kube-proxy exposes a new metric, `kubeproxy_sync_proxy_rules_last_queued_timestamp_seconds`, that indicates the last time a change for kube-proxy was queued to be applied. ([#90175](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90175), [@squeed](https://github.com/squeed)) [SIG Instrumentation and Network]
90175.author: squeed

90218.text: Avoid GCE API calls when initializing GCE CloudProvider for Kubelets.
90218.markdown: Avoid GCE API calls when initializing GCE CloudProvider for Kubelets. ([#90218](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90218), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG Cloud Provider and Scalability]
90218.author: wojtek-t

90307.text: kube-apiserver: The NodeRestriction admission plugin now restricts Node labels kubelets are permitted to set when creating a new Node to the `--node-labels` parameters accepted by kubelets in 1.16+.
90307.markdown: Kube-apiserver: The NodeRestriction admission plugin now restricts Node labels kubelets are permitted to set when creating a new Node to the `--node-labels` parameters accepted by kubelets in 1.16+. ([#90307](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90307), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG Auth and Node]
90307.author: liggitt

90328.text: kubeadm: ensure `image-pull-timeout` flag is respected during upgrade phase
90328.markdown: Kubeadm: ensure `image-pull-timeout` flag is respected during upgrade phase ([#90328](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90328), [@SataQiu](https://github.com/SataQiu)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
90328.author: SataQiu

90373.text: Avoid unnecessary scheduling churn when annotations are updated while Pods are being scheduled.
90373.markdown: Avoid unnecessary scheduling churn when annotations are updated while Pods are being scheduled. ([#90373](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90373), [@fabiokung](https://github.com/fabiokung)) [SIG Scheduling]
90373.author: fabiokung

90377.text: Fixes regression in CPUManager that caused freeing of exclusive CPUs at incorrect times
90377.markdown: Fixes regression in CPUManager that caused freeing of exclusive CPUs at incorrect times ([#90377](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90377), [@cbf123](https://github.com/cbf123)) [SIG Cloud Provider and Node]
90377.author: cbf123

90394.text: kubeadm respects resolvConf value set by user even if systemd-resolved service is active. kubeadm no longer sets the flag in '--resolv-conf' in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env. If you have this flag in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env or /etc/default/kubelet (/etc/sysconfig/kubelet for RPMs) please remove it and set the value using KubeletConfiguration
90394.markdown: Kubeadm respects resolvConf value set by user even if systemd-resolved service is active. kubeadm no longer sets the flag in '--resolv-conf' in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env. If you have this flag in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env or /etc/default/kubelet (/etc/sysconfig/kubelet for RPMs) please remove it and set the value using KubeletConfiguration ([#90394](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90394), [@SataQiu](https://github.com/SataQiu)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
90394.author: SataQiu

90419.text: Fixes regression in CPUManager that had the (rare) possibility to release exclusive CPUs in app containers inherited from init containers.
90419.markdown: Fixes regression in CPUManager that had the (rare) possibility to release exclusive CPUs in app containers inherited from init containers. ([#90419](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90419), [@klueska](https://github.com/klueska)) [SIG Node]
90419.author: klueska

90425.text: Provides a fix to allow a cluster in a private Azure cloud to authenticate to ACR in the same cloud.
90425.markdown: Provides a fix to allow a cluster in a private Azure cloud to authenticate to ACR in the same cloud. ([#90425](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90425), [@DavidParks8](https://github.com/DavidParks8)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
90425.author: DavidParks8

90449.text: The unused `series.state` field, deprecated since v1.14, is removed from the `events.k8s.io/v1beta1` and `v1` Event types.
90449.markdown: The unused `series.state` field, deprecated since v1.14, is removed from the `events.k8s.io/v1beta1` and `v1` Event types. ([#90449](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90449), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG Apps]
90449.author: wojtek-t

90458.text: authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1 and authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1 are deprecated in 1.19 in favor of v1 levels and will be removed in 1.22
90458.markdown: Authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1 and authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1 are deprecated in 1.19 in favor of v1 levels and will be removed in 1.22 ([#90458](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90458), [@deads2k](https://github.com/deads2k)) [SIG API Machinery and Auth]
90458.author: deads2k

90463.text: autoscaling/v2beta1 is deprecated in favor of autoscaling/v2beta2
90463.markdown: Autoscaling/v2beta1 is deprecated in favor of autoscaling/v2beta2 ([#90463](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90463), [@deads2k](https://github.com/deads2k)) [SIG Autoscaling]
90463.author: deads2k

90468.text: Fixes a regression in 1.17 that dropped cache-control headers on API requests
90468.markdown: Fixes a regression in 1.17 that dropped cache-control headers on API requests ([#90468](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90468), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]
90468.author: liggitt

90475.text: New scoring for PodTopologySpreading that yields better spreading
90475.markdown: New scoring for PodTopologySpreading that yields better spreading ([#90475](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90475), [@alculquicondor](https://github.com/alculquicondor)) [SIG Scheduling]
90475.author: alculquicondor

90476.text: Fixed a 1.18 regression in wait.Forever that skips the backoff period on the first repeat
90476.markdown: Fixed a 1.18 regression in wait.Forever that skips the backoff period on the first repeat ([#90476](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90476), [@zhan849](https://github.com/zhan849)) [SIG API Machinery]
90476.author: zhan849

90513.text: kubeadm does not set the deprecated '--cgroup-driver' flag in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env, it will be set in the kubelet config.yaml. If you have this flag in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env or /etc/default/kubelet (/etc/sysconfig/kubelet for RPMs) please remove it and set the value using KubeletConfiguration
90513.markdown: Kubeadm does not set the deprecated '--cgroup-driver' flag in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env, it will be set in the kubelet config.yaml. If you have this flag in /var/lib/kubelet/kubeadm-flags.env or /etc/default/kubelet (/etc/sysconfig/kubelet for RPMs) please remove it and set the value using KubeletConfiguration ([#90513](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90513), [@SataQiu](https://github.com/SataQiu)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
90513.author: SataQiu

90537.text: Fix a bug where ExternalTrafficPolicy is not applied to service ExternalIPs.
90537.markdown: Fix a bug where ExternalTrafficPolicy is not applied to service ExternalIPs. ([#90537](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90537), [@freehan](https://github.com/freehan)) [SIG Network]
90537.author: freehan

90555.markdown: Update github.com/moby/ipvs to v1.0.1 to fix IPVS compatiblity issue with older kernels ([#90555](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90555), [@andrewsykim](https://github.com/andrewsykim)) [SIG Network]
90555.author: andrewsykim

90560.markdown: Try to send watch bookmarks (if requested) periodically in addition to sending them right before timeout ([#90560](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/90560), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG API Machinery]
